books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the events surrounding the attempted assassination of President Reagan in 1981.
books.name: KILLING REAGAN

books.author: by Stacy Schiff
books.description: An account of the Salem witch trials of 1692.
books.name: THE WITCHES

books.author: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization.
books.name: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: by Michael Savage
books.description: The radio host warns Americans against Islamists and the Obama administration, which, he says, aims to impose absolute rule and destroy our civilization.
books.name: GOVERNMENT ZERO

books.author: by Ben Carson with Candy Carson
books.description: A discussion of the Constitution by the candidate for the Republican presidential nomination.
books.name: A MORE PERFECT UNION

books.author: by Tyler Oakley
books.description: Personal essays from the L.G.B.T.Q. YouTube personality.
books.name: BINGE

books.author: by Drew Barrymore
books.description: The actress shares stories about her life.
books.name: WILDFLOWER

books.author: by Ted Koppel
books.description: The journalist describes how a cyberattack on the nation’s power grids could paralyze our infrastructure, warns that government has not planned for the possibility, and visits “preppers” who are taking their own precautions.
books.name: LIGHTS OUT

books.author: by Irin Carmon and Shana Knizhnik
books.description: A celebration of the life and career of Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg.
books.name: NOTORIOUS RBG

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A meditation on race in America as well as a personal story by the Atlantic's national correspondent.
books.name: BETWEEN THE WORLD AND ME

books.author: by Carrie Brownstein
books.description: The guitarist of the riot girrl band Sleater-Kinney (and co-star of “Portlandia”) describes finding a life in music.
books.name: HUNGER MAKES ME A MODERN GIRL

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Gloria Steinem
books.description: A memoir by the feminist writer and activist is also a history of the movement.
books.name: MY LIFE ON THE ROAD

books.author: by Brandon Stanton
books.description: Photographs and interviews from the creator of the blog and the book “Humans of New York.”
books.name: HUMANS OF NEW YORK: STORIES

books.author: by Mindy Kaling
books.description: More personal essays from the comedian and actress.
books.name: WHY NOT ME?
